abstract.t: This document describes how the Security Multiparts defined in RFC1847 [1] can be used to transport multiple digital signatures.This draft is being discussed on the 'ietf-openpgp' mailing list. Tojoin the list, send a message to <ietf-openpgp-request@imc.org> withthe single word 'subscribe' in the subject. A web site containing anarchive of the list can be found at<http://www.imc.org/ietf-openpgp>.
